name: AI: Rampage (itch)
description:
This game is a tactical stealth action in a post-apocalyptic setting.

Here You will fight against the robots and to try survive in the new world.

Robots have a realistic AI, based on true visibility and audibility.

In turn, You can use vehicles, futuristic weapons and items,

such as: laser gun, invisibility device, hologram device.

What would win: machine algorithms + brute force VS

human creativity + hi-tech gadgets?

System requirements:

OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10

CPU: dual-core processor

GPU(Minimal): Geforce GT 8600 / Radeon HD 2600 / Intel HD

GPU(Optimal): Geforce GT 250 / Radeon HD 3850
